con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-UsersRolesAndLogins
con:testCase.con:description: Tests create users, logins, change pswds and modify users.

con:request.name: 120P-createAdmin-TenantAdmin
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:createAdmin>\r <adminData>\r <!--type: string-->\r <username>TenantAdmin-${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}</username>\r <password>${#TestSuite#Password}</password>\r <adUser>false</adUser>\r <!--type: guiUserType - enumeration: [USER,SYSTEM_ADMIN,TENANT_ADMIN]-->\r <adminType>TENANT_ADMIN</adminType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <administratorForTenants>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <tenants>\r <!--type: int-->\r <id>${#TestCase#tenant-1-ID}</id>\r <!--type: string-->\r <name>${#TestCase#tenant-1-Name}</name>\r </tenants>\r </administratorForTenants>\r </adminData>\r </v1:createAdmin>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 130P-createUser-RoleUser
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:createUser>\r <newUser>\r <username>User-${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}</username>\r <password>${#TestSuite#Password}</password>\r <adUser>false</adUser>\r <role>CS_AGENT</role>\r <userTenants>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <tenants>\r <id>${#TestCase#tenant-1-ID}</id>\r <name>${#TestCase#tenant-1-Name}</name>\r </tenants>\r </userTenants>\r <createComment>GoodCase-DEV-CreateRoles create new user for test from ${#Project#Tester}</createComment>\r </newUser>\r </v1:createUser>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 150N-createUser-RoleTenantAdmin-Error
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:createUser>\r <newUser>\r <!--type: username-->\r <username>TenantAdmin-${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}</username>\r <!--type: username-->\r <password>${#TestSuite#Password}</password>\r <!--type: boolean-->\r <adUser>false</adUser>\r <!--type: string-->\r <role>TENANT_ADMIN</role>\r <userTenants>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <tenants>\r <!--type: int-->\r <id>${#TestCase#tenant-1-ID}</id>\r <!--type: string256-->\r <name>${#TestCase#tenant-1-Name}</name>\r </tenants>\r </userTenants>\r <!--type: createComment-->\r <createComment>Create user must be not allowed.</createComment>\r </newUser>\r </v1:createUser>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>User with type=SYSTEM_ADMIN must have the role=ADMIN</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <specificFaultType>VALIDATION_ERROR</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>User with type=SYSTEM_ADMIN must have the role=ADMIN</errorMessage> <errorCode>102</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:getUsers>\r <!--type: first-->\r <first>0</first>\r <!--type: count-->\r <count>20</count>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: string-->\r <!--type: userTypeType - enumeration: [ALL,AD_USER,INTERNAL_USER]-->\r <userType>ALL</userType>\r <!--type: userClassificationTypeBase - enumeration: [ALL,USER,ALL_ADMINS,SYSTEM_ADMIN,TENANT_ADMIN]-->\r <userClassificationType>ALL</userClassificationType>\r </v1:getUsers>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 410P-modifyUser-TenantAdmin-Update
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:modifyUser> <user> <!--type: username--> <id>${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmm}</id> <username>${#TestCase#Admin-Tenant-Name}</username> <!--type: boolean--> <adUser>false</adUser> <!--type: userClassificationType - enumeration: [USER,SYSTEM_ADMIN,TENANT_ADMIN]--> <userClassificationType>TENANT_ADMIN</userClassificationType> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <role>TENANT_ADMIN</role> <userPermissions> <permission>ADMIN</permission> </userPermissions> <userTenants> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <tenants> <!--type: int--> <id>${#TestCase#tenant-1-ID}</id> <!--type: string256--> <name>${#TestCase#tenant-1-Name}</name> </tenants> <tenants> <id>${#TestCase#tenant-2-ID}</id> <name>${#TestCase#tenant-2-Name}</name> </tenants> </userTenants> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: createComment--> <createComment>${=context.getCurrentStep().getLabel()}</createComment> </user> </v1:modifyUser> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
